<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 221 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Weapon Improviser](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=269)

**Prerequisites**
[Weapon Improviser Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6440)

</column>

---

Whenever you make a [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306) with an improvised weapon against a creature that hasn't [observed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=84) you making a Strike using an improvised weapon or that is otherwise ignorant of your skill with improvised weapons, the creature is [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) against you for that Strike.
name: Surprise Strike
